snippet: Mario’s adventures continue to look like kids’ stuff, but the new edition still offers amusing surprises.
abstract: Stephen Totilo reviews video game New Super Mario Bros 2, developed by Nintendo for the Nintendo 3DS.
lead_paragraph: Mario’s adventures continue to look like kids’ stuff, but the new edition still offers amusing surprises.

headline.seo: New Super Mario Bros. 2 for the Nintendo 3DS
headline.main: Back to His Old Stomping Ground
headline.print_headline: Back to His Old Stomping Ground
headline.kicker: Video Game Review | New Super Mario Bros. 2
